metadata.title: CVE-2020-15969 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Use after free in WebRTC in Google Chrome prior to 86.0.4240.75 allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.

notes.note: amurray> The Debian chromium source package is called chromium-browser in Ubuntu mdeslaur> starting with Ubuntu 19.10, the chromium-browser package is just a script that installs the Chromium snap tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '82.0.2+build1-0ubuntu1').
thunderbird package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:78.4.3+build1-0ubuntu1').
